items.title: 'Number of people' killed as driver plows into crowd, Vancouver police say
items.description: "The driver is in custody," the Vancouver Police Department said in a social media post.

items.title: Trump has lowest 100-day approval rating in 80 years: POLL
items.description: Donald Trump has the lowest 100-day job approval rating of any president in the past 80 years, according to an ABC News/Washington Post/Ipsos poll.

items.title: WATCH:  Bear spotted playing on family's backyard slide
items.description: A Connecticut family got a chance to see a bear have some fun on their backyard playset earlier this month.

items.title: Trump admin live updates: Judge releases 2 migrants, rips evidence in TdA gang case
items.description: He headed to the new military immigration enforcement area without reporters.

items.title: WATCH:  'Make a Wish' kids call NFL draft picks
items.description: Two special football fans have their dreams come true when experiencing one of the biggest nights in professional football at the 2025 NFL Draft.
